item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官称节电光学芯片技术的广泛应用尚需时日
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周二表示，一项旨在降低能耗、前景广阔的新芯片技术还不够可靠，无法用于英伟达的旗舰图形处理器（GPU）。【原文：A promising new chip technology that aims to cut energy usage is not yet reliable enough for use in Nvidia's flagship graphics processing units (GPUs), Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang said Tuesday.】

item.title: 黄金因避险需求徘徊在纪录高位附近；美联储决议成为焦点
item.description: 周三，由于中东紧张局势和贸易不确定性提升了金银的吸引力，同时交易商在等待美联储当天晚些时候的决定，黄金维持在3000美元/盎司的关键水平上方，在上一交易日创下的纪录高位附近交投。【原文：Gold held above the key $3,000/oz level on Wednesday, trading near a record high hit in the previous session, as Middle East tensions and trade uncertainties lifted bullion's appeal, while traders awaited the Federal Reserve's decision later in the day.】

item.title: 日本央行一如普遍预期保持利率稳定
item.description: 日本央行周三维持利率稳定，凸显出决策者倾向于花更多时间来衡量美国提高关税所带来的日益加剧的全球经济风险会如何影响日本脆弱的经济复苏。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Wednesday, underscoring policymakers' preference to spend more time gauging how mounting global economic risks from higher U.S. tariffs could affect Japan's fragile recovery.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国推迟审批比亚迪墨西哥工厂
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引两位知情人士的话报道称，中国正在推迟批准比亚迪在墨西哥建厂，原因是担心这家电动汽车制造商开发的技术可能会泄漏到美国。【原文：China is delaying the approval for BYD to build a plant in Mexico over concerns that the technology developed by the electric vehicle maker could leak to the U.S., the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行决议前亚洲股市低迷，日元走软
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市低迷，黄金徘徊在历史高点附近，原因是经济忧虑和地缘政治格局的变化抑制了风险偏好，而日元在日本央行政策决定出台前略有走软。【原文：Asian stocks were subdued on Wednesday and gold hovered near record highs as economic worries and a shifting geopolitical landscape kept risk appetite in check, while the yen was a tad softer ahead of the Bank of Japan's policy decision.】

item.title: 日本央行决议前亚洲股市低迷，日元走软
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市低迷，黄金徘徊在历史高点附近，原因是经济忧虑和地缘政治格局的变化抑制了风险偏好，而日元在日本央行政策决定出台前略有走软。【原文：Asian stocks were subdued on Wednesday and gold hovered near record highs as economic worries and a shifting geopolitical landscape kept risk appetite in check, while the yen was a tad softer ahead of the Bank of Japan's policy decision.】

item.title: GoTo 回应 Grab 收购传闻，重申未与任何一方达成协议
item.description: 印尼 GoTo Gojek 公司周三重申，在有媒体报道称总部位于新加坡的 Grab 正在推进收购印尼 GoTo Gojek 公司后，该公司没有与任何一方就潜在交易达成协议。【原文：Indonesia's GoTo Gojek on Wednesday reiterated that there was no agreement with any party about a potential transaction after a media report emerged that Singapore-headquartered Grab was moving forward to buy it.】

item.title: 日元持稳，美元震荡，交易员等待日本央行和美联储决定
item.description: 周三，在日本央行（BOJ）和美联储（Federal Reserve）稍后做出关键利率决定之前，日元汇率保持稳定，美元则努力收复失地。【原文：The yen steadied on Wednesday while the dollar struggled to regain some lost ground ahead of key rate decisions from the Bank of Japan (BOJ) and the Federal Reserve later in the day.】

item.title: 自由欧洲电台就终止赠款一事起诉特朗普政府
item.description: 自由欧洲电台/自由电台（Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty）是美国资助的新闻机构，成立的目的是在冷战期间向共产主义统治下的人民进行宣传。【原文：Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty - the U.S.-funded news outlet set up to reach people under Communism during the Cold War - said on Tuesday it sued the administration of President Donald Trump to block the termination of the media outlet's federal grant.】

item.title: 聚焦：消息人士称，谷歌以 320 亿美元收购 Wiz 的交易在特朗普执政期间加速进行
item.description: 在谷歌收购以色列网络安全公司 Wiz 的计划失败不到一年后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在八周前宣誓就职后，谷歌高管们通过一系列谈判达成了交易。【原文：Less than a year after Google's plans to acquire Israeli cybersecurity firm Wiz fell apart, executives were able to ink a deal in a flurry of negotiations after U.S. President Donald Trump was sworn into office just eight weeks ago.】

item.title: 三星电子首席执行官称今年将进行 "有意义的 "并购
item.description: 三星电子联席首席执行官韩钟熙（Han Jong-hee）周三表示，今年三星电子将进行 "有意义的 "并购，并努力在 M&A 领域取得实际成果。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co-CEO Han Jong-hee said on Wednesday it will pursue “meaningful” mergers and acquisitions and try to produce tangible achievements in M&A this year.】

item.title: 美俄达成 30 天能源停火协议后油价有所回落
item.description: 俄罗斯同意美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的建议，即莫斯科和基辅暂时停止攻击对方的能源基础设施，这可能导致更多俄罗斯石油进入全球市场，此后油价周三下滑。【原文：Oil prices slid on Wednesday after Russia agreed to U.S. President Donald Trump's proposal that Moscow and Kyiv stop attacking each other's energy infrastructure temporarily, which could lead to more Russian oil entering global markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚迈尔公司利润下滑，股价因前景黯淡而下跌
item.description: 澳大利亚百货公司所有者迈尔（Myer）周三公布了较低的中期收益，理由是维多利亚州的一个配送中心面临物流挑战和战略审查成本，同时由于经济状况疲软，前景黯淡。【原文：Australian department store owner Myer on Wednesday posted lower interim earnings, citing logistical challenges at a distribution centre in Victoria and strategic review costs, while painting a gloomy outlook due to weak economic conditions.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进派 Starboard 准备对 Autodesk 发起代理权争夺战
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 正准备对设计软件制造商欧特克（Autodesk）发起代理权争夺战。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value is preparing to wage a proxy fight at the design-software maker Autodesk , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本 2 月出口因关税担忧导致囤货而扩大
item.description: 周三的数据显示，日本2月份出口连续第五个月增长，部分原因可能是对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普激进关税政策的担忧与日俱增，导致部分库存增加。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a fifth straight month in February, data showed on Wednesday, possibly boosted in part by some stockpiling amid growing concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's aggressive tariff policies.】

item.title: 力拓支持双重上市结构，要求股东否决帕利斯特的收购要约
item.description: 矿业巨头力拓周三支持其双重上市结构，并要求股东投票反对总部位于伦敦的对冲基金 Palliser Capital 提出的审查该公司在伦敦和悉尼两地上市的决议。【原文：Mining major Rio Tinto on Wednesday backed its dual-listed structure and asked shareholders to vote against London-based hedge fund Palliser Capital's resolution to review the firm's two listings in London and Sydney.】

item.title: Leapmotor 推出两款电动车在英国销售
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商飞跃汽车公司（Leapmotor）周三表示，通过与世界第四大汽车制造商的合资企业，该公司已开始在英国的Stellantis经销店销售两款电动汽车。【原文：Chinese EV maker Leapmotor has started selling two electric vehicle models at Stellantis dealerships in Britain via its joint venture with the world's No. 4 automaker, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在严峻的全球市场环境下，宾利创下自 2020 年以来的最低收入纪录
item.description: 宾利周三公布了自2020年COVID疫情以来的最低年收入，这家英国豪华汽车制造商在2024年将面临严峻的全球市场，但它表示正在追求 "价值大于销量"，每辆车的收入比2023年增长了10%。【原文：Bentley on Wednesday posted its lowest annual revenue since the COVID pandemic struck in 2020 as the British luxury automaker faced a tough global market in 2024, but said it was pursuing "value over volume" with revenue per car up 10% versus 2023.】

item.title: Ben & Jerry's称母公司联合利华决定解雇冰淇淋公司首席执行官
item.description: Ben & Jerry's称，其母公司联合利华（Unilever）决定罢免这家冰淇淋生产商的首席执行官戴夫-斯蒂弗（Dave Stever），从而使有关该子公司在社会政策问题上独立性的争论升级。【原文：Ben & Jerry's said its parent, Unilever , decided to oust the ice cream maker's chief executive, Dave Stever, escalating a battle over the subsidiary's independence on social policy issues.】

item.title: 美国司法部长称针对特斯拉财产的袭击为 "国内恐怖主义
item.description: 美国司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）周二谴责了最近对特斯拉财产的暴力袭击，并补充说司法部已经起诉了几名肇事者。【原文：U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi on Tuesday condemned recent violent attacks on Tesla property, adding the Department of Justice has already charged several perpetrators.】

item.title: Alphabet 320 亿美元的 Wiz 交易有望为风险投资支持者带来意外之财
item.description: 投资网络安全公司 Wiz 的风险投资公司同意谷歌母公司 Alphabet 以 320 亿美元收购该公司，种子投资者将获得高达 200 倍的回报，其中包括红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）、Cyberstarts 和 Index Ventures。【原文：The venture capital firms that invested in cybersecurity firm Wiz, which agreed to a $32 billion buyout by Google's parent Alphabet , stand to reap returns as high as 200 times for seed investors, among them Sequoia Capital, Cyberstarts and Index Ventures.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 WiseTech 公司创始人怀特承认审查结果导致信息披露不完整
item.description: 澳大利亚 WiseTech Global 公司的创始人兼执行主席承认，在审查发现他的陈述不准确、不完整和具有误导性之后，他应该向董事会全面披露其个人关系的细节。【原文：Australia's WiseTech Global founder and executive chair admitted he should have fully disclosed details of his personal relationship to the board, after a review found his statements were inaccurate, incomplete and misleading.】

item.title: 白宫称对等关税仍将于 4 月 2 日生效
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，特朗普政府仍打算在 4 月 2 日开始实施对等关税，并澄清了财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的言论，该言论暗示各国可以在美国政府开始征收新的进口关税之前进行谈判。【原文：The Trump administration still intends for reciprocal tariffs to take effect on April 2, a White House official said, clarifying comments from Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent which suggested countries could negotiate before the U.S. government begins collecting new import duties.】

item.title: 德意志银行让 DWS 首次参与私人信贷交易
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）与其资产管理部门周二表示，德意志银行将优先允许其资产管理部门参与其发起的私人信贷交易。【原文：Deutsche Bank will give its asset management arm preferred access to private credit deals it originates, the companies said on Tuesday, as the German institutions look for an edge in the booming but increasingly competitive market.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根士丹利将裁员约 2000 人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，摩根士丹利计划在本月晚些时候裁员约 2000 人。【原文：Morgan Stanley is planning to lay off about 2,000 employees later this month, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Nvidia 在年度开发者大会 GTC 上发布的所有信息
item.description: 本周二，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在其年度软件开发者大会上发布了该公司的下一代芯片产品线，旨在向投资者保证其在快速发展的人工智能产业中的主导地位。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, on Tuesday, unveiled the company's next-generation line of chips at its annual software developer conference, aiming to reassure investors of its dominance in the rapidly evolving artificial intelligence industry.】

item.title: 需求下滑，加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 零售商 Alimentation Couche-Tard 周二公布的第三季度营收不及预期，原因是通胀压力上升导致便利店和燃料业务需求低迷。【原文：Retailer Alimentation Couche-Tard missed third-quarter revenue estimates on Tuesday, hurt by sluggish demand in its convenience stores and fuel businesses amid rising inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 交易日：昙花一现的复苏被扼杀
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 日本央行将维持利率稳定，特朗普风险为前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 日本央行周三将维持利率稳定，因为决策者们将花更多时间来衡量美国提高关税的前景将如何影响依赖出口的经济。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep interest rates steady on Wednesday, as policymakers spend more time gauging how prospects of higher U.S. tariffs would affect the export-reliant economy.】
